cipher_books.description:
You wake up in a dimly lit study. Dust motes swirl through shafts of light.
A tall bookshelf lines the wall. A worn armchair sits by a cold fireplace.
A large desk holds a brass lamp, a note, and a strange box.
An iron door blocks your escape, beside it glows a numeric keypad.
